item.title: sxhkd
item.description: Go back to the programs, the doc or the front page. “sxhkd is an X daemon that reacts to input events by executing commands.” Some resources. the github page Dependencies for sxhkd. available soon. Install sxhkd. available soon. Gallery. Available soon. Snippets on the dotfiles repo. Go back to the programs, the doc or the front page.
